Text.Page:
Even the simplest nature spirits cower in fear when the shurians walk the earth. I don't know what brings them this far south, but it's probably something even worse than a shurian.

I'll bet shurians don't scare the federation's finest , though, eh?

Show those {@LinkCreature:4#2021#shurian foe-hammers} how we roll, Castanica-style!

You returned in one piece! Um, not that I doubted you.

No. Definitely no doubt on my part!

Let's keep those shurians up north where they belong!
